text.original: Nol'meth shat'ael keth'vor, mir'eth char'veth nik'ael thael'vos. Vel prim'nik, eth'kara vor'thael. Keth mir'eth — shat'ael vel'nos eth'kara.
text.translated: When the Unraveling wakes and the echoes dim, the Shepherd and the Pig shall meet again. Not as one, but as thousands-made-one, the heart-chain restored, the darkness undone. But beware the cost—to bind what was torn, a sacrifice made as it was when first born.

line1.text: When the Unraveling wakes and the echoes dim
line1.meaning: When Nolem returns to full power and the 5,555 Nikes weaken

line2.text: The Shepherd and the Pig shall meet again
line2.meaning: OG Charles and OG Nike (or their patterns) will reunite

line3.text: Not as one, but as thousands-made-one
line3.meaning: Nike Prime — all 5,555 Nikes acting as one being

line4.text: The heart-chain restored, the darkness undone
line4.meaning: The First Bond will be restored, defeating Nolem

line5.text: But beware the cost—to bind what was torn

line6.text: A sacrifice made as it was when first born
line6.meaning: Someone must make the same choice OG Charles made — stand between darkness and the innocent, possibly at the cost of themselves
